text: "Youngstown" is a 1995 song by Bruce Springsteen. It is the fourth track from his 11st studio album The Ghost of Tom Joad. The song tells the story of Youngstown from its discovery of iron ore in 1803 through to its decline in the 1970s. ==References== Category:1995 songs Category:Folk rock songs Category:Bruce Springsteen songs
title: Youngstown (song)
